bụ onye African-American na-ede ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nwere ọtụtụ ekele maka ihe nkiri nke telivishọn
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche dị ka Walt Disney Studios, Warner Bros
Animation na Hanna-Barbera Productions n'oge ọrụ nke gụnyere mmepe nke ọrụ maka Jim Henson, George Lucas, Stan Lee, Rob Minkoff na ndị ọzọ.
Semper mepụtara mkparịta ụka asụsụ Bekee maka ihe nkiri abụọ nke Hayao Miyazaki bụ Castle in the Sky na Kiki's Delivery Service, ma soro dee ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Class Act
N'ime afọ ndị 1990, Semper bụ onye mmepụta na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Spider-Man: The Animated Series nke malitere na 1994 ruo 1998.
N'afọ 2016, ọ malitere ide usoro Cyborg maka DC Comics nke Brian Stelfreeze sere.
Ihe okike Semper na nso nso a bụ ihe nkiri ezinụlọ na-atọ ọchị ma na atụ egwu a kpọrọ Creeporia
E bu ụzọ webata àgwà nke Creeporia na usoro nkiri weebụ akpọrọ Crypt of Creeporia, ngwakọta nke ihe nkiri nke ọchị na egwu
Kommerina DeYoung rụrụ ọrụ aha na webseries mbụ.

Akwụkwọ ya gụnyere The Singular Affair of the Missing Ball: A Sherlock Whippet Mystery (Lulu Press, 2005), yana ọtụtụ akwụkwọ dabere na edemede ya maka usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara PBS Jay Jay the Jet Plane, na Kids 'WB action / adventure series Static Shock
"Day of the Chameleon", ihe omume Semper dere maka Spider-Man: The Animated Series, mere ka ọ nweta nhọpụta Annie Award nke 1995 maka Best Individual Achievement for Writing in the Field of Animation
N'afọ 1996, a họpụtara usoro a maka NAACP Image Award na ngalaba Outstanding Animated / Live Action / Dramatic Youth or Children's Series / Special
N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara Semper maka Daytime Emmy maka ọrụ ya na Static Shock

Ka ọ na-erule Nọvemba 2014, iji cheta ncheta afọ iri abụọ nke Spider-Man: The Animated Series, Semper malitere cartoonspiderman.com, nke gụnyere ihe a na-eme n'azụ ihe nkiri, peeji Facebook, ozi pọdkast banyere ihe ngosi ahụ, na ozi ndị ọzọ gbasara ọrụ ya metụtara usoro ihe nkiri 1994.
